title: Cope, Hood And Orphrey, 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidery on supplementary warp pile (velvet) with gold brocading
description: Gold brocaded red pile velvet in a pomegranate design. Orphrey of gold couched with multicolored silks show eight saints. Faces of saints are an applique of silk embroidery. Hood, in the same technique as orphrey, shows the Annunciation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cope, Hood And Orphrey, 16th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidery on supplementary warp pile (velvet) with gold brocading. 1937-31-2-a,c/f.
